full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PAndI TA NO MONG KHANG GI GSOL BA 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B CES SPRUL PA'I SKU BLO BZANG DBANG CHEN DPAL 'BAR PAndI TA NO MONG KHANG LA GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS MDZAD 'PHRIN RGYAS PA'I SMON TSIG DANG BCAS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES DPON PO AER TE NI CHING DBANG DANG, GRVA TSANG GSUM GYI SLOB DPON GRVA RIGS DANG, PHYAG MDZOD BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG ,DBUS TZENG THO YON, AA CHI THU DAR HANG NANG SO SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG YE SHES KYIS SMRAS PA'O, ,
